predicate.note: Frames file for 'pinpoint' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet or Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: transitive, boring
example.text: Osamu Nagayama, deputy president of Chugai, which spends about 15% of its sales on research and development, was unable *trace* to pinpoint how much money Chugai would pump into Gen-Probe.

how much money Chugai would pump into Gen-Probe
